name: Euterpe Explorer
description:
Craving a chill virtual reality experience as a break from blowing up robots and hacking up gladiators?

  • Discover alien sounds as an exomusicologist on a research tour!
  • Exotic plants and singing aliens await on the planet Euterpe!
  • Find research samples to unlock entries in the Research Log!
  • Go up the highest peaks for a breathtaking view of the landscape.
  • An adventure for all ages. :D

Begin your journey today!

Euterpe Explorer is a VR game designed for the HTC Vive (so you won't be able to play without a headset!). Standing and room-scale compatible.

FILE UPDATE:

I received several reports of people being unable to run the game due to UnityPlayer.dll being missing. The downloadable has been updated accordingly to fix this issue. Apologies for the inconvenience!
